text:
So the problem with the react app not uploading is that I had the folder inmy windows system. With other projects I had no problme but with this it seems to hbe an issue:
How did it solve it?
1. Create a folder inside Ubuntu folder: <file://wsl.localhost/Ubuntu/home/USERNAME|\\wsl.localhost\Ubuntu\home\USERNAME> to host the projects
2. Clone the project there
Then I run into some errors. For that, if found these 2 good resources
• <https://www.alpharithms.com/fix-react-scripts-command-not-found-error-211814/#fix-4-install-react-scripts-again-locally|React Scripts Command not Found Error>
• <https://reactgo.com/typeerror-err-invalid-arg-type-react/|[ERR_INVALID_ARG_TYPE]>
CU on Saturday! :fire:
